testcase.classname: users could make a registration on the website to create an account
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user fill your personal details field..................................passed And user fill company details...............................................passed And user fill your password field...........................................passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user could register successfully.......................................passed

testcase.classname: logged user could add products to wishlist
testcase.name: success massage is visible after adding product to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user add product to wishlist...........................................passed Then wishlist notification success is visible...............................passed

testcase.classname: logged user could add products to wishlist
testcase.name: number of wishlist item in home page is increased
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter "mohamedgamal39@gmail.com" and "012345678999"...............passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then user could login successfully..........................................passed When user add product to wishlist...........................................passed When user click on wishlist link............................................passed Then number of wishlist items increased.....................................passed
